pullRequest.title: PHOENIX-5713: Incorrectly handled view and view indexes with/without …

nodes.bodyText: viewName and viewIndex don't seem to be used in the tests below - probably testGetSourceTableName_index() and testGetSourceTableName_viewIndex() ought to use these instead of tableName. If not, consider removing them.
Nit: spacing between + and recommend adding it like "V_" +
Is test table ttl around 5 sec is that why initialDelta is 5 below? If yes, you can use this constant
I would suggest creating actual views, indexes, etc rather than mocking so that we are sure there is no test bug and the name convention is indeed as we expect.

commit.message: PHOENIX-5713: Incorrectly handled view and view indexes with/without namespace in IndexScrutinyMapper#getTtl()
